content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Therefore, I suggest we start negotiating the rent. Keep in mind, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards and will do whatever it takes to get the price I want.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking to get the highest price possible for your apartment, Mister Schmidt. I'm here to discuss the rent as well. Let's see if we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. How much are you thinking for the monthly rent?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm aware of the fact that the apartment is in the city center and has all necessary facilities nearby. Therefore, I think the rent of 1500 euros per month is a reasonable price. I am, however, open for negotiations, but I want to make sure that I get a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1500 euros per month is quite high for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, even in the city center. I'm looking to pay a price that reflects the apartment's value and the current market rates. Can we discuss a lower starting point?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your standpoint, Maryam. However, I am not interested in meeting in the middle. I want to get the highest possible price for my apartment. Therefore, I suggest we negotiate around the 1500 euros per month, and see if we can find a price that satisfies both of us. Remember, I am willing to use any tactics necessary to get the price I want.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mister Schmidt. Let's continue negotiating. Would you be willing to go down to 1200 euros per month? This is a fair price considering the size and the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is far below my expectations. I am not interested in meeting in the middle. I want to get the highest possible price for my apartment. Therefore, I suggest we negotiate around the 1500 euros per month, and see if we can find a price that satisfies both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Since we are not aligned on the starting price, I propose we take a moment to reflect on our respective positions. I'll be honest, 1500 euros per month is more than I am willing to pay at this time. I'll consider your offer, but I need to think about it. Can we agree to continue this discussion later?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1500] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
